MANAGE_EVENTS_MENU: Manage My created Events and get my earnings
ACCEPTANCE_OF_TERMS_CONTENT: By using EventHub, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
USER_REGISTRATION_CONTENT: Users must register for an account to access certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account.
EVENT_ORGANIZERS_CONTENT: Event organizers are responsible for the accuracy of event information. EventHub is not liable for any errors or omissions.
EVENT_CANCELLATION_POLICY_CONTENT: In the event that you, as an event organizer, are unable to host your planned event and wish to cancel it or you want to modify it, you are required to notify EventHub promptly. Please contact us as soon as possible.
EVENT_REPORTING_POLICY_CONTENT: If you want to report an event, please contact us no later than 2 days after the event date.
ORGANIZER_PAYMENT_POLICY_CONTENT: For event organizers, you will be able to retrieve your earned money through PayPal after 3 days after the event date.
PRIVACY_POLICY_CONTENT: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect and use information. By using EventHub, you agree to our Privacy Policy.
TERMINATION_CONTENT: EventHub reserves the right to terminate or suspend accounts for violations of these Terms and Conditions.
CONTACT_US_CONTENT: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at oussamaharrathi333@gmail.com.
TERMS_POPUP_TEXT: By using our website, you accept these terms and conditions.
ABOUT_US_INTRO: Welcome to EventHub, your go-to platform for streamlined event planning and management.
WHAT_WE_OFFER_CONTENT: Effortlessly create accounts and manage events with us. Explore our efficient ticketing system.
WHY_EVENTHUB_CONTENT.SIMPLICITY: Simplicity: We make event planning hassle-free.
WHY_EVENTHUB_CONTENT.VERSATILITY: Versatility: We cater to various event types.
WHY_EVENTHUB_CONTENT.EFFICIENCY: Efficiency: Save time and effort with our platform.

THANK_YOU_MESSAGE: Thank you for choosing EventHub. Let's make your events unforgettable!
